commits.message:
EUCA-10623 - Cloud becomes unresponsive after a few days of regular use

Description: Fix memory leak issue in updateBootstrapDependencies() method.
 - Added synchronized keyword to the method name as access to both of
   the multimaps need to be thread safe.

 - Testing: Tested out the implementation in a standalone program to verify
   that the memory leak is resolved, it was.
